scripts.predeploy: rm -rf node_modules && yarn add --platform=linux --arch=x64 --target=12.x sharp aws-serverless-express express cors dynamodb-toolbox aws-sdk morgan multer multer-s3
scripts.postdeploy: rm -rf node_modules/sharp && yarn add sharp aws-serverless-express express cors dynamodb-toolbox aws-sdk morgan multer multer-s3

scripts.prewindeploy: rd /q /s node_modules & yarn add --platform=linux --arch=x64 --target=12.x sharp aws-serverless-express express cors dynamodb-toolbox aws-sdk morgan multer multer-s3
scripts.postwindeploy: rd /q /s node_modules & yarn add sharp aws-serverless-express express cors dynamodb-toolbox aws-sdk morgan multer multer-s3
